name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Damion WALKER, Appellee

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Damion WALKER, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of August, 2016, the Order of the Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for appellant Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Berto M. Elmore, for appellee Damion Walker.
casebody.head_matter:
143 A.3d 929
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Damion WALKER, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 15, 2016.
Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for appellant Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Berto M. Elmore, for appellee Damion Walker.
